mapper.insert: insert into t_bluetooth_data (id, user_id, lock_sn, search, matching, signaling, connect, send, success, count, create_time, disconnects, disconnect, pre_id, pre_name, operate_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lockSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matching,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signaling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{send,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{success,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{disconnects,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disconnect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{preName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{operateFlag,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
